name: Ten People
description:
This is a game that the color will change the method you will play, you need to fight with your sword and protect you with the shield and 8x8 pixel game

To attack you need to be the same color as the enemy to kill hem if you try but you are not in the same color, you lose a health

CONTROLS

- A, D, SPACE = movement

- Left click = expand your sword

- Right click = show your shield

- The mouse sensor for the sword (the sword look at the sword)

MADE FROM THE SUMMER HARVEST JAM
